d.name: Shaun DeLear
d.phase: [Top o' the mornin' to ye!] [Ah sure it's the calm before the storm today lad... it's a big weekend!] [Ah come on now, don't be tellin' me ye didn't know St. Patrick's day is this weekend?] [Haha yer windin' me up 'der sure? Ah ye nearly got me 'der! Here ye go, here's a gift for ye!]
d.a: Wow, 3 Irma's potions! Thanks very much!!
d.phase: [Well then, I'll be off... Gots to get ready for de drinkin' an' de partyin' sure, there's a few of us gettin on it!] [Be well!]
You head off, over the moon, with the Irma's Potions in your hand! I thought leprechauns were evil... maybe I've just been watching too many low-budget horror movies!

d.name: Al O'Moaney
d.phase: [Hi diddle dee dee, a... Oh! Hello there - nice weather for ducks, eh fella?] [I hear ye met me brother Shaun yesterday, me name's Al O'Moaney, but Betty when you call me you can call me Al!] [I'm full o' the joys today to be sure, although I might just be full of the Guinness! Have a grand St. Patrick's day weekend!]

[Der ye go! Take this *Xmas Ticket*, I found a wheen o them in me oul' strides - get yersel' up te Dinotown - get in about the snowplough game der!] [Now be off wit ye, sure it's Oireland France in Paris today, an' I'm not missin' that sure!] [*singing* From the mighty glens of Antrim, from the rugged hills of Galway...]
d.a: Thanks for the ticket Al, I'll be seeing you!
d.phase: You head off, over the moon, with the ticket in your hand! I thought leprechauns were miserly... maybe I should stop reading graphic novels!

d.name: Pat MacGroyne
d.phase: [...*singing*: Oh I used to work in Killarney, in de ol' department store, I used to work in Killarney, I don't work der any more!] [A man came into de store one day an' he asked me for some a light snack he did.]
d.a: A light snack from the store?
d.phase: [A light snack from the store. A light snack he wanted, A Cloud Burger he got! I don't work there any more.]
d.a: Haha! I hope this isn't your day job!
d.phase: [There ye are! Some burgers fer me favourite master!] [Right handy them there fer perkin' yer dinoz up lively boy...] [Sure you might bump into my second cousin twice removed if you're around tomorrow...]
d.a: Thanks, that's really kind of you!
d.phase: You head off, over the moon, with the burgers in your bag! It's a shame Pat wasn't staying longer - I was really getting to like him!

d.name: Paddy O'Furniture
d.phase: [Ah helloow there, Happy St Paddy's Day! What a day we had yesterday fella!] [Just back from the Hairy Lemon for breakfast der - it's better than the coffee and the coffee's massive!] [I found these in my coat this morning when I woke up in the hedge der - take 'em, they're yours! I say my coat, I found it in the hedge. Anyways...]
d.a: Awesome! I love digging up Joe's garden!
d.phase: [Joe's a good man sure, just don't go breakin' his shovels!] [Right, dinner at Bear fir me me lad, ye should come, de craic'll be noinety!] [Good luck te ye!]
d.a: Thanks for everything, especially the tickets - they're really useful!
d.phase: You head off, over the moon, with tickets burning holes in your pockets! Maybe it's not true what they say about leprechauns - this one seems pretty likeable!
